shadow.name: VICTIMIZATION
shadow.description: Emotional suffering as identity, perpetual victim stance
shadow.thought_pattern: Life has been so hard for me. Look at all I've suffered.

gift.name: FREEDOM
gift.description: Liberation from past emotional patterns, sovereign moodiness
gift.behavioral_signature: Owning emotional authority, not victimized by moods
gift.thought_pattern: My moods are not me. I am the space in which moods arise.

siddhi.name: FREEDOM
siddhi.description: Complete liberation, no attachment to any emotional state
siddhi.behavioral_signature: Absolute emotional freedom, no identification with feeling
siddhi.thought_pattern: All emotions pass through me. Nothing sticks.

inversion_protocols.script: You are not your suffering. You have made your pain into identity because it gives you significance. Gate 55 is emotional abundanceâ€”it experiences the full spectrum of moods. But you are not the mood. You are the one witnessing the mood. Release the story. Feel the feeling without the narrative.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: When feeling victimized, separate the sensation from the story. Feel the actual emotion without the narrative overlay.

experiment.hypothesis: If I witness moods without identifying with them for 14 days, emotional freedom will emerge.
experiment.action: Daily: Journal moods. Notice them as weather, not identity. Practice: 'I am feeling sad' not 'I am sad.'

success_criteria.target: Ability to witness moods without becoming them
